did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Finding aid, photographs (on DVD) and a flash drive.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes a finding aid to the records at Chatham Village, both a hard copy and an interactive "Archivist" version on a flash drive, which will run on Macintosh computers; a DVD with selected photographs; and a draft final report.

bioghist.p: The project was funded by Clarence S. Stein Institute for Urban and Landscape Studies in the College of Architecture, Art, and Planning. David J. Vater and Ruth Van Laningham served as principal investigators, with computer scientist Jill Wellman.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes a finding aid to the records at Chatham Village, both a hard copy and an interactive "Archivist" version on a flash drive, which will run on Macintosh computers; a DVD with selected photographs; and a draft final report.
